climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: ERGONOMIC DESIGN FOR BACK & SIDE & STOMACH SLEEPERS: The contour pillow comes in two heights, 4.33/3.15in, and has been designed to suit different preferences. Five different areas with higher side bolsters provide optimal neck support for side sleeping. The head support area has a concave design that allows your head to sink in slowly while maintaining a healthy natural curve in your neck. This unique feature reduces pressure on your neck, making it ideal for stomach and back sleepers alike

CLOUD-LIKE CUSHIONING WITH ZERO PRESSURE: This cervical pillow for neck support made of cooling gel-infused Zero Pressure memory foam, which provides adequate support and wraps your head and neck. The memory foam particles in the center area provide a massage-like effect, helping to release tension and promote relaxation. The sweeping shoulder line and center contour allow for a seamless fit and relaxing back & stomach sleep

SOFT, SMOOTH AND STRETCHY PILLOWCASE: The fabric of contour memory foam pillow has been certified by OEKO-TEX's STANDARD 100, meaning that it's free from harmful substances. The high-gram weight knit fabric is elastic and has been brushed to ensure that it's soft and gentle on your skin. Its smooth surface prevents skin irritation and wrinkles, making the ergonomic contour pillow a comfortable choice for a peaceful night's sleep

MULTIPLE COLORS AND MACHINE WASHABLE: Our cervical neck pillow comes in a variety of macaron colors, including white, light gray, dark gray, and blue, which can complement your home decor.The cervical pillows for neck pain has a hidden zipper that allows for easy removal and washing. The cervical support pillow structure includes a pillowcase, memory foam core, and lining. PLS NOTE: Leave it in a sunny, ventilated place for 48-72 hours, and the scent of new foam will dissipate within 3 days

WORRY-FREE WITH 100% SATISFACTION: Our excellent customer service ensures that any questions you have will be answered quickly and efficiently. If you're not satisfied with our memory foam cervical pillow, we offer a worry-free 30-day return or exchange policy. Invest in your sleep with our A-Class Baby-Friendly Bed Pillow for sleeping, and experience the comfort of high-quality sleep every night

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Enjoy High-Quality Sleep with Our A-Class Baby-Friendly Pillow Sleep is an essential component of our daily life, and we all need a high-quality pillow to ensure that we get a good night's rest.. Invest in your sleep with our A-Class Baby-Friendly Pillow, and experience the comfort of high-quality sleep every night.

Healthy Sleep Starts with Using This Ergonomic Pillow Ergonomic Contour Designed for Comfortable Neck Support. Prolonged desk work and unsuitable pillows can cause neck deformation and pain. This contour memory foam pillow can effectively alleviate these symptoms, although you may feel a bit uncomfortable at first. Your neck needs some time to adapt to the pillow's healthy curved design.What should I do if I feel uncomfortable using this pillow the first few times? You can start by using it for 2 hours on the first day, then try sleeping for 4 hours the next day, gradually increasing the time each day. It usually takes about a week to fully adjust. If you have been accustomed to using traditional-shaped pillows or are trying memory foam pillows for the first time, it also will take some time to adjust.OEKO-TEX's STANDARD 100 Certificated. The high-gram weight knit fabric is elastic and has been brushed to ensure that it's soft and gentle on your skin. Its smooth surface prevents skin irritation and wrinkles, making it a comfortable choice for a peaceful night's sleep. PLS NOTE: The new product may have a fresh foam odor when opened, but please rest assured that it is non-toxic and safe. Our fabric and memory foam have passed OEKO-TEX's STANDARD 100 certification. Please place the product in a well-ventilated area for 48-72 hours and the new product smell will dissipate.

Conforms to curves and gently supports The sweeping shoulder line and center contour allow for a seamless fit and relaxing back & stomach sleep. The memory foam particles in the center area provide a massage-like effect, helping to release tension and promote relaxation.

Zero-pressure memory foam Zero-pressure memory foam is characterized by its ability to absorb impact forces, providing a sensation of floating on clouds when lying on it. This results in a feeling of no pressure on the skin, ears, and body, hence the name "zero-pressure".

Ergonomic design for back, side, and stomach sleepers The higher side bolsters provide optimal neck support for side sleeping. A concave design in the center allows your head to sink in slowly while maintaining a healthy natural curve in your neck. This unique feature reduces pressure on your neck, making it ideal for back and stomach sleepers alike.
Previous page Next page 1 Multiple Colors 2 Ergonomic Design 3 Five Different Areas 4 Conforms to Curves 5 Gently Support

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Good Decent Pillow Great Price
reviews.reviewText: I've spent $100 on pillows not this comfy. This is a generally basic comfy pillow at a great price. Soft yet firm and supportive. I like the curve of the pillow. This isn't a huge pillow which I appreciate as my face doesn't if I lay on my side, as you would with a large size pillow. The memory foam is perfect on this pillow and price is very fair for the quality. Lots more expensive pillows out there that are not nearly this nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Firmer that I was looking for, but comfy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: been looking for this exact gel ergonomic pillow for my herniated neck and back.....this is EXACTLY what you need to support your vertibrae....so very comfortable and has the exact rise to it.....it does chemically smell when you first receive it but in 2-3 days its gone......5 star product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pillow smells like chemicals
reviews.reviewText: The shape and softness of this pillow is amazing, but I haven’t been able to sleep on it a full night, because the outgassing smell of chemicals from the materials used to make it is so strong. I am currently trying everything that I can to get it to not smell, like chemicals…

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic neck relief!
reviews.reviewText: This is the one you want! I have tried others.Anything made from memory foam will have a smell. But they are using a better product. I have sensitivity to odors but I thought I try this one.Yes there was a little odor out of package but I aired it for about a week. I’m a really sensitive.I would put near cracked window( winter here) overnight…AM throw in dryer on AIR fluff for 5 min with a few bath towels on top of it…..NO HEAT!Repeat alternating sides….each day.You might think this is a lot to do but the difference from other pillows I’ve tried is the odor comes out of this particular one. I will take this when I travel for sure.And I’ll probably get another one to leave at relatives house for myself.Bonus two difference thicknesses sides.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Hard As A Brick
reviews.reviewText: Don’t believe the description. When you first lay on it, the pillow is soft, but somehow gets more firm while you sleep on it. My shoulders were numb when I woke in the morning so I can only guess that it also aligned my neck in an odd way. Long story short, avoid this pillow unless you want a poor night's’ sleep. :-( :-( :-( :-( :-(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent side sleeper pillow
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been on the hunt for a good cervical pillow for sleeping and this is it for me. I’m a side sleeper and need to sleep with my spine straight because of some neck problems I’ve been having. I am able to get the perfect position of my head using this pillow and since I’ve started using it, I no longer have tingling in my arm when I try to sleep. I love this pillow. I’m sure it is very user dependent, but I think this pillow would work for a lot of people. It isn’t firm and contoured, it is more soft, like memory foam. It compresses a bit when I lay on it to fit well into the space between my neck and the bed. My hunt for the perfect pillow is over!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great quality but not for me
reviews.reviewText: I have been searching a long time for the right pillow. I really like the shape, contour, and softness of this foam pillow. I wouldn't consider this a memory foam because true memory foam have a slow release because foam conforms to your neck/body. In contrast, regular foam bounce back quickly and therefore does not hug to each curve of your neck. However, I do like their foam over others because it is not so dense. I wanted to love this pillow but it does not conform to my petite profile. The cervical loft area has 3 or 4 round raised button-like design which makes it uncomfortable. Not sure why they designed it this way. It may be more comfortable without out.I would recommend you try it because pillows are very personal and subjective. It is a great quality too.
